[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@microsoft/api-extractor-model](./api-extractor-model.md) &gt; [ApiItemContainerMixin](./api-extractor-model.apiitemcontainermixin.md) &gt; [preserveMemberOrder](./api-extractor-model.apiitemcontainermixin.preservememberorder.md)

## ApiItemContainerMixin.preserveMemberOrder property

Disables automatic sorting of [ApiItem.members](./api-extractor-model.apiitem.members.md) .

**Signature:**

```typescript
readonly preserveMemberOrder: boolean;
```

## Remarks

By default `ApiItemContainerMixin` will automatically sort its members according to their [ApiItem.getSortKey()](./api-extractor-model.apiitem.getsortkey.md) string, which provides a standardized mostly alphabetical ordering that is appropriate for most API items. When loading older .api.json files the automatic sorting is reapplied and may update the ordering.

Set `preserveMemberOrder` to true to disable automatic sorting for this container; instead, the members will retain whatever ordering appeared in the [IApiItemContainerMixinOptions.members](./api-extractor-model.iapiitemcontainermixinoptions.members.md) array. The `preserveMemberOrder` option is saved in the .api.json file.
